p: This work was supported by BBSRC Institute Strategic Programme Grant: Control of Infectious Diseases. (no. BBS/E/D/20002173) to S.J.L. and P.D.; US-UK BBSRC-NIFA Collaboration no. BB/M027163/1 and European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement no. 727922 (DeltaFlu) to P.D.; the Scottish Government Rural and Environment Science and Analytical Services Division, as part of the Centre of Expertise on Animal Disease Outbreaks (EPIC) to S.J.L. S.J.L. is also supported by a University of Edinburgh Chancellor's Fellowship and F.D. is supported by a Chancellor's Fellowship PhD studentship.
